**Member Count**:
Displays the total member count of the server
`/membercount`
**Reminder**:
Reminds you about a given object in the given time
`/remindme <object> <time>`
**Roll the dice**:
Rolls a random number at a given length(100 by default)
`/roll <number(optional)>`
**User info**:
Displays the information about the author of the command
`/useinfo`
